channel.title: [317][Delta]Issue with client connection
channel.description:
Hey,
My client works perfectly, and I can connect to my server via the no-IP url from the network that my server's on, but when someone outside my network tries to connect, they get an error connecting to server message.
Here's my client.java if you'd like to look at it: http://pastebin.com/m1162a7fb
EDIT: Yes, I am 100% sure my ports are forwarded correctly and my no-IP is set up right. That's why I'm asking this question, rather than following one of the numerous helpful tutorials on how to configure no-IP and/or portforwarding.
Thanks,
iDavid

item.title: [317][Delta]Issue with client connection
item.dc:creator: @infurnius infurnius
item.description:
@infurnius wrote:

it isnt that hard , just look at iDavid he could do it.
